text:
K. Jalapathi, former head of the Coimbatore chapter of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India, has been elected to the southern region committee of the institute as its treasurer.

Launched

Lister Metropolis, a unit of Metropolis Healthcare, has opened a state-of-the-art laboratory in Coimbatore. It can conduct more than 300 medical tests a day and also cater to samples collected from the nearby towns.
title: TAMIL NADU
